name: Vegan Yellow Cake Recipe
description: Easy Vegan Yellow Cake Recipe. Make any umber of layers, use frosting of choice to make layered birthday cake or holiday cake. Vegan Soy-free Cake Recipe. Makes 1 8 inch pan cake.
recipeIngredient: 1 Tbsp flax seed meal  (or chia seed meal)
1/2 cup vegan powdered sugar or other sugar ((1/3 cup for less sweet))
a generous pinch of turmeric for color (optional)
1 1/2 cup unbleached white flour ((1.25 cups if using a mix of whole wheat and all purpose))

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 deg F / 180ºc
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 deg F / 180ºc

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add all the wet ingredients and whisk well until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add all the wet ingredients and whisk well until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl mix in the dry ingredients, or sift directly into the bowl with wet ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl mix in the dry ingredients, or sift directly into the bowl with wet ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk until the mixture is smooth and silky. 1 to 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk until the mixture is smooth and silky. 1 to 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the batter intp parchment lined or greased and well floured 8 inch cake pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the batter intp parchment lined or greased and well floured 8 inch cake pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 30 minutes or until tooth pick from the center comes out clean. Cool completely covered with towel, Frost with favorite frosting, slice and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 30 minutes or until tooth pick from the center comes out clean. Cool completely covered with towel, Frost with favorite frosting, slice and serve.
